 CxList methods = Find_Methods();

result = methods.FindByShortName("strcpy") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("lstrcpy") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("wcscpy") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("_tcscpy") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("_mbscpy") + 
	methods.FindByShortName("CopyMemory") + // Do we really want this one???
	methods.FindByShortName("strcat") +
	methods.FindByShortName("lstrcat");
